If you're seeking a more straightforward and straightforward horror experience, 'Shark Night' (N/A) might be a better fit. This summer camp horror film features shocking and sudden jump scares in a group of vacationers' cabin, leaving viewers on edge throughout the night.

If you're more interested in a chilling portrayal of violence and its aftermath, 'Below Zero' (2011) might be more up your alley. This gritty crime film depicts a brutal prison escape and the brutal treatment of a police officer by the inmates, highlighting themes of human depravity and societal neglect.
